member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.Attachment
member.summary: Represents an attachment to an e-mail.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection
member.summary: Stores attachments to be sent as part of an e-mail message.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.AttachmentCollection.Dispose
member.summary: Releases all resources used by the AttachmentCollection.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SendCompletedEventHandler
member.summary: Represents the method that will handle the SendCompleted event.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions
member.summary: Describes the delivery notification options for e-mail. This enumeration has a FlagsAttribute attribute that allows a bitwise combination of its member values.

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions.None
member.summary: No notification.

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions.OnFailure
member.summary: Notify if the delivery is unsuccessful.

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions.OnSuccess
member.summary: Notify if the delivery is successful.

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions.Delay
member.summary: Notify if the delivery is delayed

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.DeliveryNotificationOptions.Never
member.summary: Never notify.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection.Add(System.String)
member.summary: Add a list of e-mail addresses to the collection.
member.param: The e-mail addresses to add to the MailAddressCollection. Multiple e-mail addresses must be separated with a comma character (",").

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection.InsertItem(System.Int32,OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailAddress)
member.summary: Inserts an e-mail address into the MailAddressCollection, at the specified location.
member.param: The e-mail address to be inserted into the collection.
The location at which to insert the e-mail address that is specified by item.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailAddressCollection.ToString
member.summary: Returns a string representation of the e-mail addresses in this MailAddressCollection object.
member.returns: A String containing the e-mail addresses in this collection.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailPriority
member.summary: Specifies the priority of a MailMessage.

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailPriority.Normal
member.summary: Sends the message with normal priority

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailPriority.Low
member.summary: Sends the message with low priority

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.MailPriority.High
member.summary: Sends the message with high priority

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mime.TransferEncoding
member.summary: Specifies the Content-Transfer-Encoding header information for an e-mail message attachment.

member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.summary: Looks up a localized string similar to Error receiving data from host {0}. SmtpClientHostErrorTxing Error sending data to host {0}. Error: {1}.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient
member.summary: Allows applications to send e-mail by using the Simple Mail Transfer Protocol (SMTP).

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SmtpClient class.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.#ctor(System.String)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SmtpClient class that sends e-mail by using the specified SMTP server.
member.param: A String that contains the name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.#ctor(System.String,System.Int32)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the SmtpClient class that sends e-mail by using the specified SMTP server and port.
member.param: A String that contains the name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.
An Int32 greater than zero that contains the port to be used on host
member.exception: port cannot be less than zero.

member.name: E:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.SendCompleted
member.summary: Occurs when an asynchronous e-mail send operation completes.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Host
member.summary: Gets or sets the name or IP address of the host used for SMTP transactions.
member.exception: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero.
The value specified for a set operation is equal to Empty ("").
The value specified for a set operation is null.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Port
member.summary: An Int32 that contains the port number on the SMTP host. The default value is 25.
member.exception: The value specified for a set operation is less than or equal to zero.
You cannot change the value of this property when an email is being sent.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.Credentials
member.summary: Gets or sets the credentials used to authenticate the sender.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.DeliveryMethod
member.summary: Specifies how outgoing email messages will be handled.

member.name: P:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpClient.InCall
member.summary: Determines if a send operation is in progress.

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpCredential
member.summary: Credentials to use for SmtpClient

member.name: M:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpCredential.#ctor(System.String,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Creates a new instance of the SmtpCredential class

member.name: T:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod
member.summary: Specifies how email messages are delivered.

member.name: F:OpenNETCF.Net.Mail.SmtpDeliveryMethod.Network
member.summary: An Smtp server availble to send mail messages.
